speaker: Third Senator
text_entry: SCENE III. The woods. Timon's cave, and a rude tomb seen.

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: By all description this should be the place.

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: Who's here? speak, ho! No answer! What is this?

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: Timon is dead, who hath outstretch'd his span:

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: Some beast rear'd this; there does not live a man.

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: Dead, sure; and this his grave. What's on this tomb

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: I cannot read; the character I'll take with wax:

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: Our captain hath in every figure skill,

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: An aged interpreter, though young in days:

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: Before proud Athens he's set down by this,

speaker: Soldier
text_entry: Whose fall the mark of his ambition is.
